caption.title: Model simulations fitted to accumulated MERS-CoV clinical cases in Macca, Madina and Riyadh.
caption.p: Observed data points are shown in blue and the solid line depicts the model solutions. The three two-strain models fitted to cumulative MERS-CoV cases are: M1: 2-strain model with bilinear incidence, M2: 2-strain model with non-monotone incidence, and M3: 2-strain model with saturated incidence.
